name: Zaven
description:
We’re a process-driven software development company from Wroclaw, Poland. We help businesses express themselves and connect with their audiences using the high-end web and mobile apps. 
Since 2011, we've been providing services from our office in Poland’s IT capital to our local and foreign clients, both big and small. 
We offer solutions suitable for individual needs including:
custom web or mobile app development projects, 
user-friendly UX/UI design, 
backend integration, 
data analytics,
IT outsourcing,
QA testing. 
We believe in constant personal growth as experts, which drives to taking part in many tech workshops and conferences. 
Currently, our focus is on social networking applications, which will soon appear in our portfolio. We develop solutions similar to platforms supporting Instagram or Facebook. 
Got an idea for the next big thing? Get in touch with us:
https://zaven.co
https://www.facebook.com/zaven.co
https://blog.zaven.co
